entry.title: More Plant Food
entry.summary: Gave the plants some more plant food today. The orange blossom has appeared a bit wilty lately. The habenero in the cloth pot seems to have a number of bugs on it. I didn't really see the same on any of the other peppers. I sprayed the habenero's with windex.

entry.title: Too much rain
entry.summary: There's been a lot of rain. I moved most of the potted peppers out of the works of it, but I left the cloth pot peppers out in it. It looks like that was a bad idea. The habenero does not look good and the jalepeno looks like it is going to lose all of it's leaves.

entry.title: Plants outside
entry.summary:
"Final" transplanting. In the garden: 2 habaneros, 2 jalepenos, 2 bells. 1 sun sugar, 1 goliath. And the strawberries.

Everything else in pots. Peppers are in second to largest of my plastic pots. Also have a habanero and jalepeno together in the cloth pot.
